K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-1: sa manta mu kha pra be sha ra shami bi ma loshn'a sha pra bha sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-3: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-7: zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-10: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-11: 'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-13: ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-14: rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270a-15: lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-0: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan @270b pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-1: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-2: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-4: lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-5: ji ltar lha'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba blta bas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-6: ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-9: skye ba las grol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-10: brdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-11: ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro bar ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-12: ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-13: thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-14: mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:270b-15: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du rjes su sems shing rjes su spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-0: de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g-yog lha'i bu bya @271a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-1: ba phrag stong dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-2: lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-3: lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-4: lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-5: lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu ma mchog gis me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-7: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang bzang gi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor zhing rgyags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-8: nga rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-9: de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid kyis log cing lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs te nyal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-10: de nas gnas mchog de na lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-11: kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-12: khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-13: dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-14: lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271a-15: da ste zhag bdun 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-0: lha'i @271b longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-1: khyod kyi gnas gzhal med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-2: khyod kyi srog ni yong med kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-3: thabs ni myur du rnam par soms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-4: zhes de skad ces smras nas lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-5: de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te mal nas khas bub tu sa la lhung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-6: de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag kyang skra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-12: kha nas khrag dang gsher bag ni chad nas mchu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-17: smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-18: smre ste du zhing cho nges 'debs la kyi hud kyi hud ces 'dzer cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-19: lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-20: tsandan gyi chu grang mos 'thor zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-27: kha cig ni; rkang pa nas 'ju /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-33: sa'i steng na chu med pa'i nya bzhin du 'gre ldog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-35: lus la mes tshig pa bzhin du 'gre ldog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:271b-37: smre sngags du ma 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-0: de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te dran pa thob nas kha @272a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-1: nas khrag skyug cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myong nas shugs ring du phyung ste lus 'dar zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-2: shing rlung gi shugs kyis btab pa bzhin du g-yo bar gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-3: sgra bskyungs pa'i snying gis rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la bder song ste phyin nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gtugs te rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-6: bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-7: lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis bsgo ba thos nas bdag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyid do zhes mchi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-8: sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig ces mchi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-10: thabs gang gis bdag 'chi bdag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-11: ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-13: ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar pa'i cho gas bdag la bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-14: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272a-17: gang gis 'chi bdag pham par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-0: sems can dmyal ba'i @272b sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-6: bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-11: pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-13: ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa yin gyi; 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-14: de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-15: lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-16: lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bder phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-18: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dman pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-20: lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda'i gdong gis bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-21: de dgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:272b-23: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin @273a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-1: gyi tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-2: 'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-3: 'od zer byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-4: 'od zer gyi snang ba des lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-13: 'byung po thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-14: bskul nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-15: zhugs ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-16: lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-17: 'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-18: sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzang pa chen po drag po'i tshor ba sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-20: grong khyer chen po w'a ra n'a sir smyig ma mkhan gyi phyis khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273a-21: phyis khung de na bshad gci za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-0: phyi sa khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba brgya stong gnas @273b te; de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-1: de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus kun rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-3: de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-4: de nas dgon par rus sbal gyi skye gnas su skye la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-5: de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-6: nyi tshan gyi lus gdungs shing tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus btogs nas lus dum bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-7: de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-8: lo lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-9: de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-10: w'a ra n'a si de nyid du 'bab chu chen po'i nya chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-11: de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'phangs nas lus chen po de la sbrul gdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-17: lce sbyang la sogs pas za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-18: srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-19: de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-20: lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:273b-21: de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun du skye zhing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-1: du skyes te lo drug cu'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-2: sdug bsngal de dag myong nas de nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-4: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-5: ci ste brgya la mi'i lus thob na yang dbul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-6: yan lag ma tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-8: yi ge mi shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-15: tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-16: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid mi dga' nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-18: bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-19: bdag la skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' scal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-22: 'chi bdag gi chad pa chen po'i gnyan po yod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-24: re ba med par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274a-25: des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las thar @274b par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-1: dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-3: shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-4: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-5: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-8: dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-10: re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-12: lha thams cad bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-14: skya rgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-16: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-18: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa bsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-20: chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-22: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-24: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-26: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen pos gdab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:274b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-0: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnyen po ston pa chen po bshad du @275a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas de skad ces gsol pa thugs su chud nas rnam pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-5: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor gyi dbus nas byung nas des phyogs kun tu snang bar byas te rin po che'i gdugs lta bur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-8: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-10: gang+g'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-12: thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-16: ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275a-17: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-3: de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-7: sa yi steng gi phyag dar dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-14: lus sbyong 'gyur te the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-15: dper na nyi ma shar gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-17: de bzhin su zig gzungs 'chang ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-22: de na gnas shing yang rtse'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-23: de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-24: mi rnams tshe ni zlog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-28: na ma: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-29: aom ma h'a tsint'a ma ni dzva la na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-40: sarbba ta th'a ga ta mah'a sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-47: sarbba p'a pam bi ma la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:275b-51: spa ta ya spo ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-0: @276a *// bi ga ta a'a ba ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-5: aushni sha bya ba lo ke te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-7: sa manta bya ba lo ke te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-9: ma h'a p'a sha dha re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-10: aa mo bha bi ma le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-17: aindri ya bi sho dha ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-22: bo dha ni bo dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-23: sam bho dha ni sam bho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-24: sho dha ni sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-25: sam sho dha ni sam sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-26: bi sho dha ni bi sho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-29: sarbba ta th'a ga ta ku la bhu dze /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-31: pra sa ra tu ma ma pu n+ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-33: sarbba ki lbi sha ha re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-35: sho dha ya bi ma le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-37: ka pa tsi ta bhu dze /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-38: shatp'a ra mi t'a pa ri p'u ra ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-40: sarbba ta th'a ga ta gu hy'a dhishth'a n'a dhi shthi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-43: pu n+ya bi lo ki te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-44: pu n+ya aa ba lo ki te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-51: pra ti sa ra ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-55: sarba ta th'a ga ta mu dr'a dhi shth'a n'a dhi shthi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276a-57: gzungs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu'i snying bo dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-0: khyod kyis lha'i bu de la @276b yun ring por phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-2: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang po dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs spags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-4: rnying pa bcos pa yang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-6: byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-7: nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-8: de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-10: du ru ka'i bdug pas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-12: mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-13: gang+ga'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-14: ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-15: snying po 'di bris la gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-16: aom na ma sti ya dhi k'a nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-17: sarbba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe dzva la dzva la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:276b-18: dha rmma dh'a tu garbhe sam bha ra ma ma a'a yu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manto shn'i sha bi ma le ba shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-7: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te mchod rten gyi las byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-8: tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-9: gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal pa mnyam pas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-10: 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-11: phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-12: phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-15: ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-16: phyin chad sems can dmyal ba'i sgra rna lam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-17: 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277a-20: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las bzung nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam langs pa dang rang gi gnas su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga @277b go rim bzhin du mchod rten gyi las byas nas bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-1: byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad dang bral te lus rnam par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-2: gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-7: nam mkha'i dbyings nas de bzhin gshegs pas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-9: de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus su gyur par mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga' nas aa la la sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-12: aa la la 'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-13: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-14: de nas lha'i bu de rang gi gnas su song nas lha'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-18: byug pa sna tshogs blangs te lha'i gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:277b-20: rgyan kyang blangs nas g-yog 'khor thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-0: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste bcom ldan @278a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-1: 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-2: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-3: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-7: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-9: sug las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi zad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-15: de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-17: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-18: de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-25: rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278a-27: dge ba'i bsam pa can rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-0: @278b de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-1: sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-2: de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab snang zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-5: g-yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-7: dad pa dang mi ldan zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-8: gzhan mu stegs can la dang do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-9: bram ze de ni; khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa sgrog kyang khyim bdag de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-10: de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-12: ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-13: rul sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyug gis dgang ngo snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-14: de nas 'di snyam du bsam ma thag tu khyim bdag de la sha bkra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-16: de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi gar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-17: der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-18: de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-20: rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-21: de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:278b-22: der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-0: de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer @279a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-1: de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-2: dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-3: gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-4: de na dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-5: des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas te zan byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-6: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-7: dmus long des gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-10: mi bzad pa'i las byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-11: snyam nas ngo tsha dang khrel yod par gyur te 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-12: gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus long du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-16: lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-19: sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279a-21: las des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-0: lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying por mthar thug gi bar du @279b las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-7: dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrog pa'i dge slong de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-10: de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-11: dga' ba thob par gyur te ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung nas aa la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-12: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-13: de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-14: phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-15: lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-16: bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-19: gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-21: phan yon che ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:279b-23: ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su @280a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-1: grol bar mdzad pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-5: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-6: 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-11: dge bsnyen mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-14: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-16: gang+g'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-17: bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-18: mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-21: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-23: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280a-24: phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-0: gang dang @280b gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye zhing padma las skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-1: tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-2: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-3: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-4: gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-5: des khrus byas la gos gsar pa bgos te spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-6: snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-7: mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-8: rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-9: mchod rten bzhi ni gra bzhir gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-12: shing bu btsugs te ba ngan dmar po dbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-14: bum pa gang ba lnga gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-15: gra bzhin pog phor bzhi nas du ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-18: gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-19: spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-20: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-21: snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-26: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:280b-28: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-0: @281a *// bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-1: rma bya'i sgro lngas bya ba par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-2: mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-3: cho ga 'di lan gcig byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-4: bskal par bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-9: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-10: 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-15: gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-16: tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-17: yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te sha zad pa yang lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-18: lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-19: bsam pa yang yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281a-20: phyin chad 'chi bdag gi sgo'i sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-0: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal pa mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur @281b gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der padma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-1: thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-2: skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-3: 'di'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-4: de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-5: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-6: bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-7: 'jigs pa med pa'i lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-8: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-9: dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-10: tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-11: gang+g'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-12: tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:281b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-0: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar @282a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-2: 'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-5: bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-6: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mchod rten la sgra 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-7: lags so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-8: 'phral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-12: gti mug gi dri ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-14: phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-15: lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-19: bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-20: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gre'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-21: bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282a-27: srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-0: bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig @282b bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-1: gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-2: gang dag mtho ris su skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-4: bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-5: ri la gtor na ri dvags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-6: bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-7: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-8: gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung bas bsregs pa las 'phral du yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-10: gal te 'gul nas thag pa btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-11: de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-12: sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-14: chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:282b-15: lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-0: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon @283a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-2: 'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-3: 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-4: 'bum tshang nas mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-6: nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-7: sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-8: gang+g'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-9: de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-10: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-11: gang dag de las bya ba rnams byed pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-13: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-14: gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-15: tha na grib mas phog na yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-16: bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283a-17: 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-0: @283b de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-1: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-5: dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-6: brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-7: lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-8: de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-10: gzungs sngags mthu chen po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-11: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-12: thos par dka' ba lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-14: bdag cag lhan cig tshogs nas slad ma'i che slad ma'i dus na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-16: sems can thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-17: 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-20: bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:283b-24: khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:284a-0: rig sngags kyi rgyal po yid @284a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:284a-1: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyod la gtad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:284a-2: 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:284a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-029:284a-5: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
